title: Grand Portage National Monument: Lodging
body: Lodging        Bourgeois accommodations during Rendezvous Days and Powwow NPS Photo / Suzanne Gucciardo        Many beautiful lodges, bed and breakfasts, motels and RV parks are yours to choose from while planning your visit to Minnesota’s northshore. We have included links to those lodging opportunities within about 50 miles of Grand Portage National Monument.   Something to remember: If you are planning to visit the Monument during the annual Rendezvous Days and Powwow, please plan ahead as local lodging fills up fast. The Rendezvous Days and Powwow is always held the second full weekend of August.
